entries: You follow the philosophy of the Prophecies of Kalistrade, seeking to build up your wealth in this life so that you might meet the next world on your own terms.
Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution or Intelligence, and one is a free ability boost.
You're trained in the {@skill Diplomacy} skill and the {@skill Lore||Kalistrade Lore} skill. You gain the {@feat Bargain Hunter} skill feat.
